column5: Enjoy this home that is located only 10 minutes from DFW airport and 20 minutes from downtown Dallas. It is placed down the street from Old Town Coppell which is walking distance to many great restaurants. The house is located in a very safe neighborhood at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac.   The first bedroom has a full bed with a mattress topper for extra comfort, the room also has a walk in closet.   The 2nd Bedroom has a trundle bed with two twin mattress as well as a walk in closet.
column8: Adorable Texas Home All To Yourself
